title: Colorful Console Output with JavaScript
description: In this lab, we will explore how to add color to text output in the console using special characters in JavaScript. We will learn how to use the colorize function to apply different text and background colors to our console output, making it more visually appealing and easier to read. By the end of this lab, you will be able to create colorful and eye-catching console output in your JavaScript applications.

meta.title: Colorful Console Output | JavaScript Tutorials
meta.description: Learn how to add vibrant colors to your console output in JavaScript using the colorize() function. Create eye-catching and visually appealing console logs.
meta.keywords: JavaScript, console, color, colorize, text formatting, visual appeal, coding tutorials

verify.name: Verify Node Command Usage
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
